channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Synology Router Manager (SRM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Synology Router Manager (SRM)

item.title: CVE-2023-0077|2024-08-02T04:54:32.609Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Integer overflow or wraparound vulnerability in CGI component in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-6 and 1.3.1-9346-3 allows remote attackers to overflow buffers via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2023-41739|2024-08-02T19:09:47.896Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability in File Functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.3.1-9346-6 allows remote authenticated users to conduct denial-of-service attacks via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2023-41740|2024-08-02T19:09:47.982Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in cgi component in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.3.1-9346-6 allows remote attackers to read specific files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2023-32956|2024-08-02T15:32:46.508Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability in CGI component in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-6 and 1.3.1-9346-3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2023-32955|2024-08-02T15:32:46.553Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability in DHCP Client Functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-6 and 1.3.1-9346-3 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2023-41741|2024-08-02T19:09:47.890Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Exposure of sensitive information to an unauthorized actor vulnerability in cgi component in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.3.1-9346-6 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2023-41738|2024-08-02T19:01:35.451Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability in Directory Domain Functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.3.1-9346-6 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39347|2024-07-02T16:39:01.301Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in firewall functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to access highly sensitive intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39347|2024-06-28T06:30:10.727Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in firewall functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to access highly sensitive intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39348|2024-06-28T06:30:57.973Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Download of code without integrity check vulnerability in AirPrint functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39348|2024-06-28T13:39:34.938Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Download of code without integrity check vulnerability in AirPrint functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39347|2024-08-02T04:26:14.241Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in firewall functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to access highly sensitive intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39348|2024-08-02T04:26:14.241Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Download of code without integrity check vulnerability in AirPrint functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.
